title: Part 901 - Mandated Reporter Requirement and Background Checks
content:
Part 901 - Mandated Reporter Requirement and Background Checks

State Regulations

Subpart 901-1 - Mandated Reporter ReQuirement, Statewide Central Register Of Child Abuse and Maltreatme Nt, and Register of Substant Iated Category One Cases of Abuse or Neglect (ยง 901-1.1)

Subpart 901-2 - CRIMINAL HISTORY INFORMATION REVIEWS (ยง 901-2.1 to 901-2.8)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
